channel.title: BF 2142 Closes Down 5 mins in to game
channel.description:
It's been happening ever since I got 2142. I launch the game, log in, start a game, play for 3-5 mins and then it reverts back to the desktop and closes down the game.
I've searched Google but I've found no quick fix :( Any ideas, thoughts?
My computer meets the specs of the game.

item.title: BF 2142 Closes Down 5 mins in to game
item.dc:creator: @Mr.Chris Mr.Chris
item.description:
@Mr.Chris wrote:

BF2 seems to run perfect for me. Looks like I need to give EA an unpleasant e-mail…

P.S - There Master Server is bullocks -.-

Read full topic
item.source: BF 2142 Closes Down 5 mins in to game

item.title: BF 2142 Closes Down 5 mins in to game
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

r00nboi:

Could be a virus… I had a thing with like all my games where i would start it up then a few minutes later it would close and give no error message or anything

doubt that.

Yeah it used to happen to me in bf2 though it wasnt always 5 minutes into the game, it could be like half an hour into a heated match and then it just dissapears. But it just stopped happening for me :S

Read full topic
